title: maudo
author: maudo
content: for some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: What is your budget? There are a lot of casino scripts flying around but a lot of those are poorly designed and don't have enough games to even start with. On the other hand, I might be able to help with PG.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: maudo on February 10, 2023, 02:22:31 PMup to 1300usdt@bets21 has a history of taking clients' money without doing the work, so be careful before you text him.If you do not know any developer *personally and legally,* he may build a system with some vulnerabilities, and thus may cause you to lose money.Also, developing an ideal website needs a development team, not a single developer.its better to think about any other system that don't have hot wallet.

comments.author: Carr91
comments.body: Quote from: maudo on February 09, 2023, 06:23:22 PMfor some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?I actually bought phoenix gambling's script, they have 3 versions of the platform, the first one that has been developed around 2018 I think, the second one which is the "pro" version of the first one and the third one which has been recently released, I would not advise anyone to buy from this developer, the first platform works kinda well but half of the games have a lot of bugs and the admin panel has little to no features to properly manage the platform.The second one is a total mess, apart from the graphics being updated, everything else is a total mess, completely useless.The third one that has been recently released (december 2022) and I haven't even been able to try it, the developer added a "license" and an automatic installer system even though I paid for the full source code, I tried installing it on a new ubuntu 22.04 server as per documentation but the installer got stuck, on the second attempt the license the developer provided was not working anymore as it has "already been used", tried contacting the developer to ask for support and he's been ignoring me for weeks and then replying with a "hello" and going back to not replying for weeks again.I initially bought the platform in august 2022 and since then I still haven't been able to have a fully functioning bug-free platform, I even paid extra for bug-fixes and feature implementations that the developer never delivered.The platform is not complete trash but it still needs a lot of fixing and it misses a lot of necessary features. The problem is the developer, if you buy from him you will get a platform that looks good but has a lot of bugs and is nowhere near ready to be used as a finished product, he will try to upsell you bug fixes, new features, promotional casino videos etc...I highly advise you or anyone else to not buy from him, I'm actually thinking of leaking all 3 of his versions or find a developer that can take his work up and fix it if he continues to behave like that.

The problem is the developer, if you buy from him you will get a platform that looks good but has a lot of bugs and is nowhere near ready to be used as a finished product, he will try to upsell you bug fixes, new features, promotional casino videos etc...I highly advise you or anyone else to not buy from him, I'm actually thinking of leaking all 3 of his versions or find a developer that can take his work up and fix it if he continues to behave like that.Any idea if it's just a single person or a group of people behind the script?

comments.author: @saadat68
comments.body: Hi sirIf you want a simple betting script, I have one:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4414422.0

comments.author: Carr91
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on February 15, 2023, 08:09:25 PMQuote from: Carr91 on February 15, 2023, 03:40:08 PMQuote from: maudo on February 09, 2023, 06:23:22 PMfor some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?I actually bought phoenix gambling's script, they have 3 versions of the platform, the first one that has been developed around 2018 I think, the second one which is the "pro" version of the first one and the third one which has been recently released, I would not advise anyone to buy from this developer, the first platform works kinda well but half of the games have a lot of bugs and the admin panel has little to no features to properly manage the platform.The second one is a total mess, apart from the graphics being updated, everything else is a total mess, completely useless.The third one that has been recently released (december 2022) and I haven't even been able to try it, the developer added a "license" and an automatic installer system even though I paid for the full source code, I tried installing it on a new ubuntu 22.04 server as per documentation but the installer got stuck, on the second attempt the license the developer provided was not working anymore as it has "already been used", tried contacting the developer to ask for support and he's been ignoring me for weeks and then replying with a "hello" and going back to not replying for weeks again.I initially bought the platform in august 2022 and since then I still haven't been able to have a fully functioning bug-free platform, I even paid extra for bug-fixes and feature implementations that the developer never delivered.The platform is not complete trash but it still needs a lot of fixing and it misses a lot of necessary features. The problem is the developer, if you buy from him you will get a platform that looks good but has a lot of bugs and is nowhere near ready to be used as a finished product, he will try to upsell you bug fixes, new features, promotional casino videos etc...I highly advise you or anyone else to not buy from him, I'm actually thinking of leaking all 3 of his versions or find a developer that can take his work up and fix it if he continues to behave like that.Any idea if it's just a single person or a group of people behind the script?I think there are a couple of people behind the project since their only contact is a telegram user and by interacting with him you get the feeling that he only has basic understandings of web development and cryptocurrencies (even though the platform's deposits and withdrawals are fully crypto based). I think the guy on telegram is only a salesperson (he also speaks russian) the platform has probably been made by some underpaid russian developers and the guy on telegram made a website and sells it for 2.000$ (it was 1800$ for the basic versione and 3500$ for the pro version before).

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Carr91 on February 16, 2023, 03:06:30 PMQuote from: alterra57 on February 15, 2023, 08:09:25 PMQuote from: Carr91 on February 15, 2023, 03:40:08 PMQuote from: maudo on February 09, 2023, 06:23:22 PMfor some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?I actually bought phoenix gambling's script, they have 3 versions of the platform, the first one that has been developed around 2018 I think, the second one which is the "pro" version of the first one and the third one which has been recently released, I would not advise anyone to buy from this developer, the first platform works kinda well but half of the games have a lot of bugs and the admin panel has little to no features to properly manage the platform.The second one is a total mess, apart from the graphics being updated, everything else is a total mess, completely useless.The third one that has been recently released (december 2022) and I haven't even been able to try it, the developer added a "license" and an automatic installer system even though I paid for the full source code, I tried installing it on a new ubuntu 22.04 server as per documentation but the installer got stuck, on the second attempt the license the developer provided was not working anymore as it has "already been used", tried contacting the developer to ask for support and he's been ignoring me for weeks and then replying with a "hello" and going back to not replying for weeks again.I initially bought the platform in august 2022 and since then I still haven't been able to have a fully functioning bug-free platform, I even paid extra for bug-fixes and feature implementations that the developer never delivered.The platform is not complete trash but it still needs a lot of fixing and it misses a lot of necessary features. The problem is the developer, if you buy from him you will get a platform that looks good but has a lot of bugs and is nowhere near ready to be used as a finished product, he will try to upsell you bug fixes, new features, promotional casino videos etc...I highly advise you or anyone else to not buy from him, I'm actually thinking of leaking all 3 of his versions or find a developer that can take his work up and fix it if he continues to behave like that.Any idea if it's just a single person or a group of people behind the script?I think there are a couple of people behind the project since their only contact is a telegram user and by interacting with him you get the feeling that he only has basic understandings of web development and cryptocurrencies (even though the platform's deposits and withdrawals are fully crypto based). I think the guy on telegram is only a salesperson (he also speaks russian) the platform has probably been made by some underpaid russian developers and the guy on telegram made a website and sells it for 2.000$ (it was 1800$ for the basic versione and 3500$ for the pro version before).I see, I actually have a copy of the script, was trying to start a casino in the past with a partner and from what he told me you could milk a shit ton of money out of it because of some bugs. It's a good and cheap code to get if you want to build on top of it. Thanks for the answer, at this point I'm convinced there was a 3rd party who made this and seems like there's no way to reach out to them.

The problem is the developer, if you buy from him you will get a platform that looks good but has a lot of bugs and is nowhere near ready to be used as a finished product, he will try to upsell you bug fixes, new features, promotional casino videos etc...I highly advise you or anyone else to not buy from him, I'm actually thinking of leaking all 3 of his versions or find a developer that can take his work up and fix it if he continues to behave like that.Any idea if it's just a single person or a group of people behind the script?I think there are a couple of people behind the project since their only contact is a telegram user and by interacting with him you get the feeling that he only has basic understandings of web development and cryptocurrencies (even though the platform's deposits and withdrawals are fully crypto based). I think the guy on telegram is only a salesperson (he also speaks russian) the platform has probably been made by some underpaid russian developers and the guy on telegram made a website and sells it for 2.000$ (it was 1800$ for the basic versione and 3500$ for the pro version before).Hey man I saw your post about buying win5x from phoenix gambling back in august 2022.I've been fixing their free (leaked) version since then and I can say that I managed to fix majority of the bugs.Even the crash works now.You can check my demo at: demoscript.onlineIf you'd like to talk more about it send me your telegram in private message.Even the guy who made this thread contacted me to buy the script however he tried to scam me by sending fake btc transaction.

comments.author: MadisonScripts
comments.body: Hi, I have recently released the first version of BETPrime - Crypto Casino Script. This is the first version of the script, we are still working on adding updates and new features such as more games, slots, third party providers, sportsbook and more...https://sanitydigital.com/products/betprime-online-crypto-casino-script

comments.author: Maxre
comments.body: Quote from: maudo on February 09, 2023, 06:23:22 PMfor some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?I do not think that's good idea because if you want to open casino than you might have at least 50k dollars plus volume because this is not a game where only you will win and also for sure always Casio wins but still you have to pay a lot of users and other promotions so that your casino might get a lot of attention and traffic.I will suggest you to buy some crypto and hold for the future bull run and I think that it will happen in coming years like 2024 end and also 2025. And I also think that it will be huge too.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I see people all the time thinking they can buy a casino script from a stranger and then suddenly be running a massive online casino.  I guess my first question to people who think this way is this...  Would you deposit money and gamble on a site that bought a casino script from someone on an online forum?  I think the odds are extremely high you would end up with a casino that is full of backdoors and as an operator, going this route would seemingly display that you aren't willing to put in the hard work and effort necessary to make a casino a success.  Just my two cents, which are quite possibly worthless.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: Quote from: maudo on February 09, 2023, 06:23:22 PMfor some time now i have been looking to buy complete crypto casino script like https://demo.phoenix-gambling.com/ but they are expensive and i read that they have some bugs in the casino system. anyone can offer me anything ?Personally, I find it a really bad idea, although not sure if anyone can make money from using them, but if they really work, why don't they use it to make money themselves but sell it to you ? I guess it's just ideas and the buyers are the ones who have to spend money to experiment for the seller
